LanguageData.PickCompositeColourDesc: Pick the colour of the cured synthamide composite
LanguageData.CommandCompositeModeDesc: Toggle between curing plasteel or composite at this autoclave
LanguageData.DrillingPhaseDesc:
The oil derrick has been constructed, but the well still needs to be drilled.

A colonist with the construction skill must supervise the drilling operation until it is complete.

Up to 3 colonists can supervise the drilling at the same time to speed up the process

Progress: {0}
LanguageData.PlaceDirectlyOverWell: Too close to existing wellhead, Place directly over an unused well to access it again
LanguageData.CuringFailed: Curing failed due to power loss
LanguageData.DrainStorageTankDesc: Drain the contents of this tank to other available tanks
